short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will format ClickUp task name without losing any character

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you having trouble about task name including unicode when creating git branch in Clickup?

This extension will format it to make the task name friendly, readable.
Just open Create Branch modal in ClickUp and click Format it on this extension.
=> Task name will be format to friendly, readable form.
=> You will never to confuse about your task.

*** New features
- Support adding task's code.

Features
- Format task name.
- Support adding task's folder name.

* Currently support for Vietnamese characters only.
